title: The recent patch and Azir
body:
I have wanted to pick up Azir for a while now, did he get hit really hard in the recent patch?
He cant take down towers as fast and does not have the movement speed with his ult anymore, does that hurt him a lot, or is he still a good champ to invest time and learn to play properly?{{champion:268}}

replies.body:
Nope, still does what he does best and bully enemies till they die while shredding them under tower.

Movement speed buff was never noticeable and his wall still provides hefty CC while maintaining a barrier which still does its job because 3 seconds is more than enough. 

The only real nerf was to stinger which only just delays his power spike. 

Overall a strong champ with lots of safety in lane and very rewarding when used correctly.
With his attack speed you can chunk towers anyway and i never used his ult for the full 7 seconds so it just means you can't wall for as long

Honestly that just means that azir will spend most of his time near towers with soldiers up hitting enemies instead of using them to take towers really quickly.

More of a poke then a siege, also the move speed on his ult was minor and not worth all that much.
